CVEN is the name Concordia Ventures token
1 CVEN = 1 ETH
Please send ETH to the following smart contract address
You will receive CVEN immediately via smart contract feature.
Please send your CVEN tokens to the address indicated below. Ethereum gas fees apply. ETH will be credited back to the same wallet.
What is CVEN?
CVEN is an ERC20 token and a stablecoin used within Concordia Ventures. You can use CVEN to purchase projects\' tokens.
Why Use CVEN?

If you use CVEN (instead of BTC or ETH) to buy a project\'s tokens, you will receive 1% worth of CVEN tokens as a bonus. For example, if you buy 1,000 tokens for 100 CVEN, you will receive 1 CVEN token for free.
Can I Exchange CVEN back to ETH?
Yes, since CVEN is our stable coin, you can Sell CVEN back to us at anytime for ETH. We will deposit the ETH to your sending CVEN wallet address within one to three business days.
Are there any other fees for buying or selling CVEN tokens?
Since CVEN is an ERC20 token, all standard Ethereum blockchain gas fees apply.
